rules.ruleString: For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ATS1194, ATS1195, ATS2194, SPN1080, SPN2040, SPN2050, SPN2060, SPN2070, SPN2080, SPN3050, SPN3060, SPN3070, SPN3080} Otherwise Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS2194, ATS2195}

unitName: Film and society in Spain and Latin America
description: This unit introduces students to a variety of Spanish and Latin American films, with particular emphasis on recent material by contemporary directors. This unit will further deepen the student's knowledge and understanding of Spanish and Latin American cultures via the medium of film. The unit aims to develop an awareness of different critical approaches to film analysis, including genre, style and the interaction between films and their socio-cultural contexts. The unit covers issues such as identity, sexuality, history, colonialism and nationalism.
